item.title: Boston Therapeutics Inc 10-K
item.description: Boston Therapeutics Inc, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 23, 2021 had 37266 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 630 instances stock - 385 instances may - 354 instances 000 - 344 instances clinical - 225 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
